C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: upf
args: ip tuntap add name ogstun mode tun; ip addr add 10.45.0.1/16 dev ogstun; sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6=1; ip link set ogstun up; sh -c "echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward"; iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -s 10.45.0.0/16 ! -o ogstun -j MASQUERADE; open5gs-upfd -c /open5gs/config-map/upf.yaml;
